channel.title: How do you change starting stats?
channel.description: when you start out you have 99hp i want it to be 10 how could i do this?

item.title: How do you change starting stats?
item.dc:creator: @unseen545 unseen545
item.description:
@unseen545 wrote:

i did that and now it appears 10/99 instead of 10/10 and doggie im using Fr33sc4p3

item.title: How do you change starting stats?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Open player.java and open the Find/Search box.

In the search area type

for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++)

You should now see something like this

	for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels
			if (i == 3) {
				playerLevel[i] = 10;
				playerXP[i] = 600;
	}
		}

If you dont see that, or if you have something else, change your code to the one I posted above. This will make the HP be set to 10 when you make an account. Enjoy.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change starting stats?
